CustomField.description: Used to group Prod Categories for use on new Product Dashboard that is being built for Prod Category Managers
CustomField.formula:
CASE( Segment__c , "Print", "Print", "Publishing", "Publishing", "Logistics Solutions", "Logistics", (CASE ( Product_Category__c ,
"BAGS", "Bags", "POLY BAGS", "Bags",
"MAILERS", "Mailers",
"CHEMICALS", "Chemicals", "CHEMICALS-PRIVATE BRAND", "Chemicals",
"CORRUGATED", "Corrugated & Retail", "RETAIL PACKAGING", "Corrugated & Retail", "FOLDING CARTON", "Corrugated & Retail", "SURFACE PROTECTION", "Corrugated & Retail",
"CUSHIONING", "Cushioning", "TEMPERATURE CONTROLLED/COLD CHAIN PACKAGING", "Cushioning",
"SHRINK FILM", "Films", "SPECIALTY FILM", "Films", "STRETCH - BANDING", "Films", "STRETCH FILM", "Films", "STRETCH FILM-PRIVATE BRAND", "Films", "STRETCH - HAND GRADE FILMS", "Films", "STRETCH - MACHINE GRADE FILMS", "Films", "STRETCH - NETTING", "Films",
"AMENITIES", "FS - Other", "RETAIL/OFFICE AND SCHOOL SUPPLIES", "FS - Other", "OTHER SUPPLY", "FS - Other",
"Janitorial Power Equipment", "JanSan Tools and Equipment", "JANITORIAL POWER EQUIPMENT-PRIVATE BRAND", "JanSan Tools and Equipment", "Janitorial Supplies", "JanSan Tools and Equipment", "JANITORIAL SUPPLIES-MATTING", "JanSan Tools and Equipment", "JANITORIAL SUPPLIES-PRIVATE BRAND", "JanSan Tools and Equipment", "Receptacles and Material Handling", "JanSan Tools and Equipment",
"CAN LINERS", "Liners and Food Service", "CAN LINERS-PRIVATE BRAND", "Liners and Food Service", "FOOD SERVICE", "Liners and Food Service", "FOOD SERVICE-PRIVATE BRAND", "Liners and Food Service", "Personal Hygiene", "Liners and Food Service", "PERSONAL HYGIENE-PRIVATE BRAND", "Liners and Food Service",
"EQUIPMENT - PACKAGING", "Packaging Equipment & Parts", "PARTS", "Packaging Equipment & Parts",
"Personal Protection and Safety", "PPE", "PERSONAL PROTECTION AND SAFETY-PRIVATE BRAND", "PPE",
"SKINCARE", "Skincare", "SKINCARE-PRIVATE BRAND", "Skincare",
"LABELING & IDENTIFICATION", "Labeling & Identification",
"STRAPPING", "Strapping",
"ADHESIVES", "Tapes", "TAPES", "Tapes", "TAPES-PRIVATE BRAND", "Tapes",
"TOWELS/TISSUES", "Towel, Tissue, Wipers", "TOWELS/TISSUES-PRIVATE BRAND", "Towel, Tissue, Wipers", "WIPERS", "Towel, Tissue, Wipers",
"Pkg - Other")))
CustomField.label: Product Grouping
